entry.title: QGIS Meeting in Chattanooga TN (USA), October 25th 2019
entry.content: There will be a QGIS centric meeting in the United States in Chattanooga, Tennessee On October 25th 2019

entry.title: II Reunión Nacional de Usuarios QGIS México 2019, 21-23 Noviembre 2019 Guadalajara (México)
entry.content: Asiste, Comparte, aprende y convive con la comunidad QGIS México en las distintas actividades como: Ponencias Magistrales, Conferencias, mesas de trabajo, Talleres y carteles/ mapas.

entry.title: December 12-13th 2019, Montpellier - France - 7th Annual user conference of the QGIS French user group
entry.content: Barcamp, Community Sprint, Conference and Talks for the 7th Annual User Meeting Conference in Montpellier, France
